rescuecore2.view
Class ViewComponent

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              rescuecore2.view.ViewComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
LayerViewComponent
public abstract class ViewComponent
extends javax.swing.JComponent

A JComponent that shows a view of a world model.

Serialized Form

render

protected abstract java.util.Collection<RenderedObject> render(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics,
                                                               ScreenTransform transform,
                                                               int width,
                                                               int height)
Render the world and return the set of RenderedObjects.

Parameters:
graphics - The graphics to draw on. The origin is guaranteed to be at 0, 0.
transform - The ScreenTransform that will convert world coordinates to screen coordinates.
width - The width of the viewport.
height - The height of the viewport.
Returns:
The set of RenderedObjects.

updateBounds

protected void updateBounds(double xMin,
                            double yMin,
                            double xMax,
                            double yMax)
Update the bounds of the view in world coordinates.

Parameters:
xMin - The minimum x coordinate.
yMin - The minimum y coordinate.
xMax - The maximum x coordinate.
yMax - The maximum y coordinate.
